{{short description|American country music singer|bot=PearBOT 5}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Joanna Cotten | image = | image_size = | origin = [[Memphis, Tennessee]] | instrument = | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | occupation = Singer | years_active = 2007â€“present | label = [[Warner Bros. Records]] | associated_acts = | website = {{official website|http://www.joannacotten.com/}} }} '''Joanna Cotten''' (born in [[Memphis, Tennessee]]{{cite book|last=Whitburn|first=Joel|title=Hot Country Songs 1944 to 2008|publisher=Record Research, Inc|page=105|year=2008|isbn=978-0-89820-177-2}}) is an American [[country music]] singer. Cotten's debut single, "The Prize," peaked at number 60 on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Hot Country Songs]] chart.{{cite news|last=Morris|first=Edward|title=Luke Bryan, Eagles Bound Onto the Charts|url=http://www.cmt.com/news/country-music/1567860/luke-bryan-eagles-bound-onto-the-charts.jhtml|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20080511021711/http://www.cmt.com/news/country-music/1567860/luke-bryan-eagles-bound-onto-the-charts.jhtml|url-status=dead|archive-date=May 11, 2008|accessdate=September 2, 2011|newspaper=[[Country Music Television]]|date=August 25, 2007}} Cotten recorded 21 songs for an unreleased album for [[Warner Bros. Records]]. She split from the label in December 2007 after the release of a digital-only [[extended play]].{{cite news|title=Joanna Cotten splits with Warner|url=http://www.countrystandardtime.com/news/newsitem.asp?xid=1241|accessdate=September 2, 2011|newspaper=Country Standard Time|date=December 20, 2007}} Cotten has continued to record and tour.{{cite news|last=Hight|first=Jewly|title=Joanna Cotten has no label, but she's got verve|url=http://www.nashvillescene.com/nashville/joanna-cotten-has-no-label-but-shes-got-verve/Content?oid=1200253|accessdate=September 2, 2011|newspaper=[[Nashville Scene]]|date=March 12, 2009}} From 2013 to 2022, she was a member of [[Eric Church]]'s band. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! style="width:10em;"| Title ! style="width:20em;"| Details |- ! scope="row"| ''Funkabilly'' | * Release date: April 10, 2008 * Label: self-released |- ! scope="row"| ''Joanna Cotten'' | * Release date: March 30, 2009 * Label: self-released |} ===Extended plays=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! style="width:10em;"| Title ! style="width:20em;"| Details |- ! scope="row"| ''Funkabilly'' | * Release date: September 25, 2007 * Label: [[Warner Bros.
